attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Set the data in the table header details column

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: Details column title; The default value is Detail Bar with Table Header.

attrs.name: text-split
attrs.desc: Details column title separator; The default value is ':'

attrs.name: dialog-title
attrs.desc: Personalized pop-up window title; Default to'Personalization'

attrs.name: label-title
attrs.desc: Personalized pop-up window header text title bar field; The default value is'Field'

attrs.name: tips
attrs.desc: Prompt message that cannot be completely hidden; The default value is'At least one is displayed'

attrs.name: value-title
attrs.desc: Personalized pop-up window header text operation column field; The default value is'hidden'

attrs.name: save-button
attrs.desc: Text of the confirmation button in the personalized pop-up window; The default value is'OK'

attrs.name: cancel-button
attrs.desc: Text of the cancel button in the personalized pop-up window; The default value is'Cancel'
